name: FAQ Schema
author: Muhammad Waseem Panhwer

sections.description:
FAQ schema is an easy to use plugin which easily can add faq schema on your post, page or any other post type you just need to use a simple
shortcode to add this faq schema in your website.

At a glance, this plugin adds the following:

  • User can easily add the faq schema by adding these shortcode in there post: [faq]Your frist question|=|your first Answer|SEP|Your Second Question|=|Your Second Answer[/faq].
sections.faq:
Default settings

How to use FAQ schema on website Post or Page
*[faq]Your frist question|=|your first Answer|SEP|Your Second Question|=|Your Second Answer[/faq]
